name: 9 Year Old Builds Her First RPG...  TRUTH & TROLLS!
blurb: They\u2019re mean and vicious and they just might come after you next. You\u2019ve got to help!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Your name will appear in the "SPECIAL THANKS" section of the game's credits.
THE GAME!  You will receive a copy of the RPG via digital distribution when it is completed in July 2013.
Koozie: I drink like a girl...Keep Up! + THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed July 2013.

Truth & Trolls: The Pen and Paper Companion: An RPG sourcebook for people who enjoy the game and want to keep the experience going. The book will cover the locations, characters and items of the game (highlighting those named by backers) and provide material for both the Fate and Pathfinder systems under the OGL. In addition to more information about the world and a short adventure, the Pen and Paper Companion will include material aimed at helping young gamers and creators of all stripes develop stories and characters to share with their friends and family. And maybe a few adults can enjoy it too. Current estimate is at 96 pages but the length may increase depending on the size of the source game. The book will be made available through PDF to backers and then available for sale on DriveThruRPG.\r\n\r\nThe book will be developed by Rain Pletcher, a longtime gamer with a background in film and theater. A veteran of child and teen educational camps in storytelling, writing and character development, these experiences with children will be leveraged to create material to help inspire children to tell their own stories. This will be the first RPG writing project for the author.
Deluxe Mousepad + THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed July 2013.
2-SIDED PRINTED WHITE T-SHIRT \r\n(Adult: S, M, L, XL, XXL & Kids: S, M, L, XL)\r\n+ THE GAME via digital distribution in July.
2-SIDED WOMEN'S FITTED WHITE T-SHIRT (XS, S, M, L, XL) + THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed 7/13
Keep Up! Embroidered Hat + THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed in July.

Deluxe White Hoodie (great for men and women).  Front of the sweatshirt is blank and the back is beautifully embroidered with "Keep Up!" in black. Personal favorite because if someone can read "Keep Up!" it means (by definition) they are BEHIND you! + THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed July 2013.

Name a character in the game (age appropriate names only) along with a copy of the game. Imagine the joy in your child's eyes when they play a game with a character named after them! Of course, that means you also get THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed July 2013.

Weapon Master:  Your name/nickname as the name a Powerful Weapon plus an 8 x 10 color print of YOUR POWERFUL WEAPON along with its name and description, hand-signed by Mackenzie and the artist. Also makes a great gift when you choose to name it after someone special. Plus a DRM-FREE copy of the game when it's released.

PRODUCERS ROCK!  Be a Producer with your name listed in the credits as "Producer" plus THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed in July 2013 along with a personal thank you letter from Mackenzie.
Be an NPC!  You get to name an NPC plus THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed in July 2013

Executive Producer + Signed Cover Art + THE GAME:  Get signed cover art with a personalized thank you from Mackenzie as well as your name listed with Executive Producer Credit plus THE GAME via digital distribution when it's completed in July 2013 along with a handwritten (& heartfelt) thank you note from Mackenzie.
